title: All we know about innovation in food and agriculture

tasks.task: Discuss challenges and innovations in agricultural systems.
Promote the importance of farmer innovation and community engagement.
Showcase successful public-private partnerships and pilot projects.
subtasks: The transcript discusses the challenges in global agri-food systems and solutions involving digital technologies and innovation. To generate tasks relevant to the content, the following main tasks (MAINTASKs) and subtasks (SUBTASKs) can be created:

tasks.task: Discuss challenges and innovations in agricultural systems.
Promote the importance of inclusive practices and farmer engagement.
Showcase successful collaborations between public and private sectors.
Discuss global food security challenges and innovative solutions.
Highlight the importance of inclusivity in agricultural innovation
Showcase successful examples of digital agricultural platforms and projects
Advocate for public and private partnership in advancing agricultural technologies
